pages.text: The $(mob)Nightstag$() is a common neutral animal that spawns in the $(thing)Midnight$(). It is passive until attacked, at which point it charges the aggressor with its antlers, dealing damage and inflicting $(thing)Darkness$() on its target. It can be bred using $(item)Unstable Fruit$(), but beware, this fruit causes any creature that eats it to levitate allowing $(mob)Nightstags$() to easily escape improperly enclosed pens.
$(mob)Nightstags$() drop $(item)Raw Stag Flanks$() on death, which are a great source of food when cooked, and one of few sources found in the $(thing)Midnight$().
